verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician עַֽל־ <WH5921> upon מָחֲלַ֗ת <WH4257> upon Mahalath מַשְׂכִּ֥יל <WH4905> Maschil לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> [A Psalm] of David אָ֘מַ֤ר <WH559> hath said נָבָ֣ל <WH5036> The fool בְּ֭לִבּוֹ <WH3820> in his heart אֵ֣ין <WH369> There אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> [There is] no God הִֽ֝שְׁחִ֗יתוּ <WH7843> Corrupt וְהִֽתְעִ֥יבוּ <WH8581> are they and have done abominable עָ֝֗וֶל <WH5766> iniquity אֵ֣ין <WH369> is no עֹֽשֵׂה־ <WH6213> [there is] none that doeth טֽוֹב׃ <WH2896> good

אֱ‍ֽלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> God מִשָּׁמַיִם֮ <WH8064> from heaven הִשְׁקִ֪יף <WH8259> looked down עַֽל־ <WH5921> upon בְּנֵ֫י <WH1121> upon the children אָדָ֥ם <WH120> of men לִ֭רְאוֹת <WH7200> to see הֲיֵ֣שׁ <WH3426> if there were מַשְׂכִּ֑יל <WH7919> [any] that did understand דֹּ֝רֵ֗שׁ <WH1875> that did seek אֶת־ <WH853> אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> God

כֻּלּ֥וֹ <WH3605> Every סָג֮ <WH5472> Every one of them is gone back יַחְדָּ֪ו <WH3162> they are altogether נֶ֫אֱלָ֥חוּ <WH444> become filthy אֵ֤ין <WH369> There עֹֽשֵׂה־ <WH6213> [there is] none that doeth ט֑וֹב <WH2896> good אֵ֝֗ין <WH369> is no גַּם־ <WH1571> even אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> no not one

הֲלֹ֥א <WH3808> no יָדְעוּ֮ <WH3045> no knowledge פֹּ֤עֲלֵ֫י <WH6466> Have the workers אָ֥וֶן <WH205> of iniquity אֹכְלֵ֣י <WH398> ? who eat up עַ֭מִּי <WH5971> my people אָ֣כְלוּ <WH398> [as] they eat לֶ֑חֶם <WH3899> bread אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <WH430> upon God לֹ֣א <WH3808> no קָרָֽאוּ׃ <WH7121> they have not called

שָׁ֤ם ׀ <WH8033> There פָּֽחֲדוּ־ <WH6342> fear פַחַד֮ <WH6343> There were they in great לֹא־ <WH3808> no הָ֪יָה֫ <WH1961> had been פָ֥חַד <WH6343> [where] no fear כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> was for God פִּ֭זַּר <WH6340> hath scattered עַצְמ֣וֹת <WH6106> the bones חֹנָ֑ךְ <WH2583> of him that encampeth הֱ֝בִשֹׁ֗תָה <WH954> [against] thee thou hast put [them] to shame כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> because God מְאָסָֽם׃ <WH3988> hath despised

מִ֥י <WH4310> Oh יִתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> Oh that מִצִּיּוֹן֮ <WH6726> [were come] out of Zion יְשֻׁע֪וֹת <WH3444> the salvation יִשְׂרָ֫אֵ֥ל <WH3478> of Israel בְּשׁ֣וּב <WH7725> bringeth back אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> When God שְׁב֣וּת <WH7622> the captivity עַמּ֑וֹ <WH5971> of his people יָגֵ֥ל <WH1523> shall rejoice יַ֝עֲקֹ֗ב <WH3290> Jacob יִשְׂמַ֥ח <WH8055> shall be glad יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> [and] Israel
